mapper.sql: id, goods_name, goods_title, goods_img, goods_detail, goods_price, goods_stock
mapper.select: SELECT g.id, g.goods_name goodsName, g.goods_title goodsTitle, g.goods_img goodsImg, g.goods_detail goodsDetail, g.goods_price goodsPrice, g.goods_stock goodsStock, sg.seckill_price seckillPrice, sg.stock_count stockCount, sg.start_date startDate, sg.end_date endDate FROM t_goods g LEFT JOIN t_seckill_goods sg on g.id=sg.goods_id

SELECT g.id goodsId, g.goods_name goodsName, g.goods_title GoodsTitle, g.goods_img goodsImg, g.goods_detail goodsDetail, g.goods_price goodsPrice, g.goods_stock goodsStock, sg.seckill_price seckillPrice, sg.stock_count stockCount, sg.start_date startDate, sg.end_date endDate FROM t_goods g LEFT JOIN t_seckill_goods sg on g.id=sg.goods_id where g.id=#{goodsId}
